channel.title: deal on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in deal on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Microsoft to acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion (3 minute read) Microsoft is acquiring Activision Blizzard in a deal valued at $68.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-21
item.description: Meta Has Created A New Tool To Animate Your Child’s Drawings Using AI (1 minute read) Animated Drawings is a tool from Meta that can automatically animate drawings of human-like figures.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-08
item.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook engineered a secret $275 billion deal with China (3 minute read) A recently published report details Apple CEO Tim Cook’s efforts to establish strong relationships between Apple and the Chinese government.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-11
item.description: Google foils Roku’s YouTube TV ban, adds service to the main YouTube app (3 minute read) Roku recently removed the YouTube TV app from its store due to a disagreement with its contract with Google.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-27
item.description: Salesforce is in talks to buy Slack, deal could be announced next week (2 minute read) Slack shares closed almost 38% higher on Wednesday after it was reported that Salesforce was in talks to acquire the company.
